reviewText: This series shows step by step how to learn and study the Bible. The principles start out very basic and build upon each other until the student begins to see the picture unfolding right before them on the screen. From Genesis to Revelation, the Bible truths are revealed in such a simple and straightforward manner. Be sure to check out One Book Rightly Divided: The Key to Understanding the Bible and One Book Stands Alone: The Key to Believing the Bible. This series, along with those two books, is all you need to know how to study the Bible and which version to use. Life changing!
